1370: Wigherus was born in Lange gracht in 1370.
Got married to Iris at age 25 in 1370.
Had a son with Iris, Kornillis, at age 25.
1371: Had a daughter with Iris, Atghardis, at age 26.
1372: Had a son with Iris, Engelbertus, at age 27.
1373: Had a son with Iris, Bartrarde, at age 28.
Lost son Bartrarde when Bartrarde was 1 years old.
1374: Lost his wife Iris while she was giving birth to Sanders in 1374.
1386: Lost daughter Atghardis when Atghardis was 16 years old.
